title: Demonstrators suffering from the effects of tear gas
description: Smoke is visible in the background. Photographer's description: These are photos taken for the protesters from Tahrir street, Galaa Square and bridge, and Qasr ELnil Bridge on the 28th of january.
collection: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
source: From: Demonstrators suffering from the effects of tear gas
